description: The ID of this Google Search 'news story' tabulated result.
name: id

description: The ID of the Google Search instance to which this news story belongs.
name: base_id

description: The list index of the news story within the row or column of this search instance.
name: list_index

description: The container index of the news story of this search instance (mobile only).
name: container_index

description: The class of this news story (e.g. a top story, or a local news story).
name: class

description: The type of news story (is it presented as a row type or column type).
name: type

description: The source URL of the news story.
name: source_url

description: The publisher of the news story.
name: publisher

description: The URL of the publisher's website for this news story.
name: publisher_url

description: The title of the news story.
name: title

description: The time of publication of the news story.
name: time_of_publication

description: Whether or not this news story is a video.
name: is_video

description: The image thumbnail (Base64 string or URL) of the news story.
name: media_thumbnail_url
